mapper.select: select r.id, r.role_name roleName, r.enabled enabled, r.create_by createBy, r.create_time createTime, u.user_name AS 'user.username', u.user_email AS 'user.userEmail' from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id where u.id = #{userId}
